title: Right-click to remove blocks
description:
Implement block removal:
- Right-click removes block at cursor position
- Emits block_removed signal
- Updates renderer
Acceptance: Can right-click to remove placed blocks.

title: Create Godot project structure
description:
Create project.godot with proper settings.
Create folder structure: src/, scenes/, assets/, data/.
Create main.tscn as entry scene.
Acceptance: Project opens in Godot 4 without errors.

title: Render blocks isometrically
description:
Create BlockRenderer (src/core/block_renderer.gd):
- Iterates Grid, creates Sprite2D for each block
- Uses grid_to_screen() for positioning
- Y-sorting for proper depth
- Z-level offset for floors
Acceptance: Blocks render at correct isometric positions.

title: Stairs block for vertical connectivity
description:
Add stairs block type:
- Connects Z to Z+1 (spans two floors)
- Flood-fill traverses stairs vertically
- Visual shows connection between floors
Acceptance: Stairs allow vertical connectivity in flood-fill.

title: Basic camera with pan/zoom
description:
Implement Camera2D with:
- WASD/arrow keys for panning
- Mouse wheel for zoom (0.5x to 3x)
- Smooth movement with lerp
- Camera bounds to prevent infinite scroll
Acceptance: Camera pans and zooms smoothly with limits.

title: Simple block picker UI
description:
Create UI for block selection:
- HBoxContainer with 4 buttons (one per block type)
- Visual feedback for selected type
- Keyboard shortcuts 1-4
Acceptance: Can select block type via UI or keyboard.

title: Create Godot 4 project structure
description: Create project.godot, folder structure (src/core/, src/blocks/, src/environment/, src/agents/, src/transit/, src/economy/, src/ui/, scenes/, assets/sprites/blocks/, data/), and main.tscn entry scene. Acceptance: Opens in Godot 4 without errors.

title: Add placeholder sprite
description: Create a simple 64x32 isometric placeholder sprite and display it in main scene. Acceptance: Sprite visible when running game.

title: Implement camera pan and zoom
description: Camera2D with WASD/arrow pan and mouse wheel zoom. Acceptance: Can navigate around the game world smoothly.

title: Floor visibility system
description:
Implement floor rendering rules:
- Current floor: 100% opacity
- Floor below (Z-1): 50% opacity
- Two below (Z-2): 25% opacity
- Floors above current: hidden
- Update when floor changes
Acceptance: Floors fade by depth, above floors hidden.

title: Milestone 3 - Connectivity
description: Block adjacency and path connectivity

title: Placeholder block sprites
description:
Create 64x64 isometric placeholder sprites:
- corridor: gray
- residential: blue
- commercial: green  
- industrial: orange
Save to assets/sprites/blocks/{type}.png
Acceptance: 4 colored placeholder sprites exist.

title: Adjacency detection
description:
Add Grid.get_neighbors(pos: Vector3i) -> Array[Vector3i]:
- Returns 6 directions: +X, -X, +Y, -Y, +Z, -Z
- Only returns positions that have blocks
Acceptance: Can query adjacent blocks in 6 directions.

title: Block base class
description:
Create Block class (src/core/block.gd) with:
- grid_position: Vector3i
- block_type: String
- Signals: block_placed, block_removed
Acceptance: Block instances can be created with position and type.

title: Visual indicator for unconnected blocks
description:
Show disconnected blocks visually:
- Red tint or warning icon on unconnected blocks
- Toggle overlay on/off with key (C for connectivity)
Acceptance: Can see which blocks are not connected.

title: Grid data structure
description:
Create Grid class (src/core/grid.gd) with:
- Sparse Dictionary[Vector3i, Block]
- get_block(pos), set_block(pos, block), remove_block(pos)
- grid_to_screen(Vector3i) -> Vector2 conversion
- TILE_WIDTH=64, TILE_HEIGHT=32, FLOOR_HEIGHT=24
Acceptance: Can store/retrieve blocks by 3D position.

title: Milestone 2 - Floor Navigation
description: Vertical floor switching and visibility

title: Floor level tracking
description:
Add current_floor state:
- Global or GameState singleton with current_floor: int
- UI label showing current floor
- Min floor 0, max floor 10 initially
Acceptance: Game tracks and displays current floor.

title: Milestone 0 - Project Skeleton
description: Basic Godot project setup with camera controls

title: Entrance block and connectivity
description:
Add entrance block type and connectivity:
- New block type 'entrance' at Z=0 only
- Add 'connected' boolean to Block class
- Flood-fill from entrance marks reachable blocks
- Recalculate on block add/remove
Acceptance: Blocks reachable from entrance marked connected.

title: Floor navigation controls
description:
Add floor switching:
- Up/Down buttons in UI
- Page Up/Page Down keyboard shortcuts
- Clamp to valid range
Acceptance: Can switch floors with UI and keyboard.

title: Implement adjacency detection
description: Grid.get_neighbors(pos) returns 6 adjacent Vector3i positions. get_connected_neighbors(pos) filters to actual walkable connections. Acceptance: Can query what blocks are adjacent to any position.

title: Implement connectivity flood-fill
description: calculate_connectivity(entrance_pos) does BFS from entrance, marks reachable blocks as connected=true. Recalculates when blocks placed/removed. Acceptance: Blocks know if they're connected to entrance.

title: Add entrance block type
description: Add 'entrance' block type to blocks.json. This is the connection point to outside world. Grid tracks entrance position. Acceptance: Can place entrance, connectivity calculated from it.

title: Show connectivity warning on disconnected blocks
description: Blocks with connected=false show warning icon overlay. Acceptance: Visual feedback when blocks are unreachable.

title: Add stairs block type
description: Add 'stairs' block to blocks.json. Stairs connect current floor to floor+1 (spans 2 Z levels). Update connectivity to traverse stairs. Acceptance: Can connect floors vertically with stairs.

title: Add elevator shaft block type
description: Add 'elevator_shaft' block to blocks.json. Vertical stack of elevator shafts connects all floors it spans. Acceptance: Can build elevator connecting multiple floors.

title: Milestone 1 - Grid & Blocks
description: Core grid system and block placement

title: Block registry with JSON loading
description:
Create BlockRegistry singleton (src/core/block_registry.gd):
- Loads data/blocks.json at startup
- get_block_data(type_id) -> Dictionary
- Create data/blocks.json with 4 types: corridor, residential, commercial, industrial
Acceptance: Can query block properties by type ID.

title: Click to place blocks
description:
Implement block placement:
- screen_to_grid() conversion (inverse of grid_to_screen)
- Left-click places current block type at mouse position
- Uses current floor level for Z
- Ghost preview before placement
Acceptance: Can click to place blocks on the grid.

title: Implement Grid class
description: Create src/core/grid.gd with: sparse 3D Dictionary (Vector3i -> Block), set_block(), get_block(), remove_block(), grid_to_screen(), screen_to_grid() using 64x32 isometric math. Acceptance: Unit tests pass for coordinate conversion.

title: Implement Block base class
description: Create src/core/block.gd with: grid_position (Vector3i), block_type (String), sprite reference, and basic signals (block_placed, block_removed). Acceptance: Can instantiate Block with position and type.

title: Implement BlockRegistry
description: Create src/core/block_registry.gd that loads block definitions from data/blocks.json. Include 4 types: corridor, residential, commercial, empty. Each has: name, cost, category, sprite path. Acceptance: Can query block definitions by type.

title: Create blocks.json data file
description: Create data/blocks.json with 4 block types: corridor (transit, $50), residential_basic (residential, $500), commercial_basic (commercial, $800), empty (void, $0). Include sprite paths and basic properties. Acceptance: Valid JSON, parseable by BlockRegistry.

title: Setup isometric rendering with Y-sort
description: Configure main scene for isometric rendering: ysort_enabled on block container, proper z-ordering (higher Z = behind). Blocks render at correct screen positions. Acceptance: Stacked blocks display correctly with depth.

title: Implement block placement on click
description: Left-click places currently selected block type at mouse position (converted to grid). Right-click removes block. Acceptance: Can place and remove blocks interactively.

title: Create simple block picker UI
description: HBoxContainer with buttons for each block type (corridor, residential, commercial). Clicking selects that type for placement. Show selected type visually. Acceptance: Can switch between block types.

title: Create basic block sprites
description: Create 64x32 isometric placeholder sprites for: corridor (gray), residential (blue), commercial (green). Store in assets/sprites/blocks/. Acceptance: Distinct visual appearance for each type.

title: Add floor selector UI
description: UI panel with: current floor indicator, up/down buttons to change viewing floor. Acceptance: Can switch between floors 0-10.

title: Implement floor visibility system
description: Show current floor fully opaque, 1-2 floors below with transparency, hide floors above current view. Acceptance: Visual depth when viewing multi-story structure.

title: Enable block placement on any floor
description: Block placement uses current viewing floor as Z coordinate. Acceptance: Can build a 5-story structure by switching floors and placing blocks.
